couplers.name: Forward Coupler
couplers.description: Forward Coupler double flange transmission to dampener.
installation_steps: Align the coupler with the shaft.
Apply anti-seize to the bolt threads.
Torque the bolts in a crisscross pattern.
Inspect for proper alignment before operation.

couplers.name: Dampener Coupler
couplers.description: Coupler to dampener retaining nut to shaft.

specs.torque_specs: 790 ft-lbs coupler bolts and 180 ft-lbs for retaining plate

installation_steps: Slam the dampener onto the shaft.
Secure with lock plate and 3 Allen bolts.
Apply anti-seize to the Allen bolt threads.
Torque the bolts in a crisscross pattern, and use safety wire.
Torque the Aft flange to the forward flange
Inspect for proper alignment before operation.
